name: Furious Race ( 3D Car Racing Games )
description:
Enjoy the most spectacular racing game in the App Store!

Experience all of the excitement, competition and glory of championship racing. This is handheld racing like you've never seen before, in the most stunning, realistic and intuitive racer on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad.

Get Furious Race today, and find out what everyone is raving about!
